scripts.build: docker build -t es7-and-beyond .; npm run build:dev
scripts.es7: docker stop es7-dev; docker rm es7-dev; docker run -it --user root -p 3000:3000 -p 5858:5858 -p 35729:35729 -v $PWD:/var/app -v es7-node-modules:/var/app/node_modules --name es7-dev es7-and-beyond:dev bash; exit 0
scripts.clean: docker stop es7-dev es7-prod; docker rm es7-dev es7-prod; docker rmi es7-and-beyond es7-and-beyond:dev; exit 0
